mapper.select: SELECT c.ID, c.NAME, c.REG_NO, a.ID as ADDRESS_ID, a.ADDRESS_1, a.ADDRESS_2, a.ADDRESS_3, a.ADDRESS_4, a.ADDRESS_5, a.POSTAL_CODE, a.EMAIL, a.TELEPHONE, a.FAX, a.DATE_CREATED as ADDRESS_CREATED, a.DATE_MODIFIED as ADDRESS_MODIFIED, a.OPT_COUNT as ADDRESS_OPT_COUNT, c.CODE, c.INC_DATE, c.TX_SCHEME_ID, c.DATE_CREATED, c.DATE_MODIFIED, c.OPT_COUNT FROM COMPANY c LEFT OUTER JOIN ADDRESS a on (c.ADDRESS_ID = a.ID) WHERE c.ID = #{id}

SELECT c.ID, c.NAME, c.REG_NO, a.ID as ADDRESS_ID, a.ADDRESS_1, a.ADDRESS_2, a.ADDRESS_3, a.ADDRESS_4, a.ADDRESS_5, a.POSTAL_CODE, a.EMAIL, a.TELEPHONE, a.FAX, a.DATE_CREATED as ADDRESS_CREATED, a.DATE_MODIFIED as ADDRESS_MODIFIED, a.OPT_COUNT as ADDRESS_OPT_COUNT, c.CODE, c.INC_DATE, c.TX_SCHEME_ID, c.DATE_CREATED, c.DATE_MODIFIED, c.OPT_COUNT FROM COMPANY c LEFT OUTER JOIN ADDRESS a on (c.ADDRESS_ID = a.ID) WHERE c.CODE = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY (NAME, REG_NO, CODE, INC_DATE, ADDRESS_ID, DATE_CREATED) VALUES (#{name}, #{registrationNumber}, #{code}, #{incorporationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address.primaryKey}, strftime('%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S', current_timestamp, 'localtime'))
mapper.update: UPDATE COMPANY SET NAME = #{name}, REG_NO = #{registrationNumber}, CODE = #{code}, INC_DATE = #{incorporationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE_MODIFIED = strftime('%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S', current_timestamp, 'localtime'), OPT_COUNT = #{optCount} + 1 WHERE ID = #{primaryKey} AND OPT_COUNT = #{optCount}
